EmailTemplate.name: CWD Grad invite Bham 10am
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
INVITATION TO YOUR GRADUATION
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Congratulations, you have completed your Challenge with Distinction award!
We would love to see you at the 2012 Graduation Ceremony to congratulate you on this amazing achievement!.
Please let us know if you are coming.
RSVP by clicking on the following link: http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3a13301d9d6cbaa&q1={!Lead.Id}&q2=1
Where: The Great Hall University of Birmingham Edgbaston Birmingham B15 2TT
When: 24/10/2011
10:00 - 13:30
www.thechallengesociety.org
facebook.com/thechallengesociety
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
